title: How to make Candy Bark in your Favorite Team Colors
description: Learn how to make this Team Colors Football Candy Bark. With Wilton’s vast assortment of Candy Melts candy, this fun candy bark can be customized to fit any team colors! Make it for a youth football treat, or impress the guests at your big game party. We’ve got everything you need for the best game time treats!

asset.author: Wilton
asset.description:
Learn how to make this Team Colors Football Candy Bark. With Wilton’s vast assortment of Candy Melts candy, this fun candy bark can be customized to fit any team colors! Make it for a youth football treat, or impress the guests at your big game party. We’ve got everything you need for the best game time treats! 

Get the printable how-to here: http://bit.ly/2cGvwSU 

Stay Sweet, Subscribe: http://s.wilton.com/10vmhuv

Ingredients: 
- Candy Melts - http://bit.ly/2dKMqQt 
- Nonpareils 6-Mix Sprinkles - http://bit.ly/2dx7A5C 
- Jimmies 6-Mix Sprinkles - http://bit.ly/2cGzxqg 
- White Sugar Pearls - http://bit.ly/2ddjvWm 
- Football Icing Decorations - http://bit.ly/2dx7vdN
